message.body: Hello! I think we will be arriving at 7- is that too late!? Or too early? We are flexible! Thank you again!
Perfect! Roast beast, with mushrooms and caramelized (hopefully) onions, salad, potatoes, decent pinot noir, dates and cambozola will be here!
Omg we were supposed to do the groceries though!
Tell us how we can contribute booo haha that sounds amazing though wow

Ah. You snooze, you lose...;) there's also bacon and eggs fur breakfast or I can make French toast with the leftover challah from tonight's dinner. Bring yourselves! If you have a favorite dessert go ahead, but this is my pleasure. I am looking forward to it! I just hope it turns out.....
Great! Alec heard there were a bunch of accidents on 95 and it was slow all the way through 95 south so we might be a bit late but hopefully it won't affect us. Can't wait to see you!
Whew ok we are definitely going to be late. What is your address again? I'll give you eta soon but it's more like 8 I'm so sorry
That looks amazing! Pls start without us bc it's traffic all the way down but we are on way slowly making it to you ✌️
